spec_data.Name: python-mozdevice
spec_data.Description:
Mozdevice provides an interface to interact with a remote device such
as an Android phone connected to a workstation. Currently there are
two implementations of the interface: one uses a TCP-based protocol to
communicate with a server running on the device, another uses
Android's adb utility.
